description: An All-in-One Algo-Trading Framework: Backtest -> Train -> Trade -> Monitor. Machine / Deep Learning Ready. Supports All Trading: TradFi+CeFi+DeFi. Code Once, Trade Anywhere.

SAFER-6G : Framework IA pour la scurit des rseaux 6G. Le projet utilise le Machine Learning pour analyser le trafic rseau simul, dtecter les cyberattaques en temps rel (dbit, latence, etc.), et prsenter les alertes sur un tableau de bord interactif.

MLForge is an open-source, modular machine learning framework written in C++ that provides a robust foundation for developing, testing, and benchmarking a variety of machine learning algorithms. Its design emphasizes clarity, efficiency, and flexibilitymaking it a powerful tool for both educational and prototyping purposes.

This project builds a machine learning framework to improve loan default prediction by combining traditional credit attributes with real-world transaction behavior. Instead of treating borrowers as static profiles, the model captures dynamic financial patterns such as spending volatility, activity frequency, and temporal behavioral shifts.

Elastic Guardian is a modular AI framework that structures machine learning projects from research and prototyping to scalable deployment. It emphasizes clean architecture, reproducible pipelines, model evaluation, optimization, and API integration to transform experimental ML workflows into production-ready systems.
A Machine Learning Framework for Comprehensive Classification of Plant Transcription Factors
This project implements a hybrid machine learning framework for spam detection across multiple Online Social Networks (OSNs).
Open Machine Learning Compiler Framework

An acausal modeling framework for automatically parallelized scientific machine learning (SciML) in Julia. A computer algebra system for integrated symbolics for physics-informed machine learning and automated transformations of differential equations

Here I developed a Python framework for ML-driven risk modeling using Restricted Boltzmann Machines (RBMs) for probability distribution learning, Monte Carlo simulations for scenario testing, and advanced statistical techniques to evaluate loan default risk and portfolio losses. Includes visualization dashboards for decision
Astronomical machine learning framework with advanced data analysis and interactive 3D visualization capabilities.
Machine learning framework for the identification of Non-Coding RNAs
A Rust powered PyTorch-like Machine Learning framework.

AI-driven framework for monitoring deforestation and vegetation loss in Southern Nigeria using synthetic remote sensing data and machine learning. Designed for reproducibility, policy simulation, and capacity building in data-scarce regions, with scalable pathways to real satellite-based forest monitoring systems.
Interpretable machine learning framework for treatment choice prediction in lung cancer using anonymized clinical data
Thesis Work:  Sector-specific, regime-sensitive framework for stock price prediction utilizing machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) methods.
An efffcient privacypreserving  framework designed to mitigate communication bottlenecks in distributed machine learning.
A reproducible, deployment-oriented evaluation framework for machine learningbased malware detection, featuring packer-aware generalization, low-FPR thresholding, and statistical validation
This repository contains Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence resources including, theoretical framework, projects, completed courses and competitions.

Health Insurance Cost Prediction App  This web app, which is built with the Streamlit web development framework, uses a machine learning regression algorithm for the purpose of health insurance cost predictions, taking into consideration the personal and lifestyle characteristics of the individual.

This repository contains the implementation of an Auto-K hybrid clustering framework for segmenting forest fire risks to support data-driven policy making in Smart City West Java. The system combines machine learning clustering techniques with the PDSA (Plan-Do-Study-Act) cycle to enable continuous policy improvement.
Asset Integrity Engineer bridging RBI decision frameworks, data engineering, and applied machine learning through transparent automation.
A Python-based machine learning framework for real-time voice-to-text and text-to-voice conversion using modern speech processing technologies.

Neural Machine Translation (NMT) is an AI framework for automatically translating text between languages using deep learning models. It leverages sequence-to-sequence architectures, attention mechanisms, and transformer-based models to deliver accurate, context-aware, and scalable translation across multiple languages in real time.
The PennyLane-Qrack plugin integrates the Qrack quantum computing framework with PennyLane's quantum machine learning capabilities.

AltCredAI is an AI-powered alternate credit scoring framework designed to expand lending access to unbanked individuals and MSMEs.This project uses machine learning models to estimate Probability of Default (PD) from alternative financial signals and converts PD into an interpretable credit score with fairness auditing and explainability.

A machine learning framework, dataset and research sub-module about coevolutionary planetary intelligence dynamics. This project explores how nurturing its emergent patterns may lead to a synergistic increase in the overall capability and intelligence of both individual agents and the collective system.

This project presents a complete machine-learning framework designed to improve sustainable agriculture. It addresses the modern struggle with unpredictable crop yields, improper fertilizer application, and rising agricultural waste through an integrated approach combining Predictive Analytics and Computer Vision.
The AIP-G 1.0 (Alzheimers disease, Inhibitor Predictor for GSK-3, version 1.0) pipeline implements a two-stage machine learning framework for predicting GSK-3 inhibitors for Alzheimers disease.
SmallML is a three-layer Bayesian framework that enables small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to build production-grade machine learning models despite having limited customer data.

This project is a web based malware detection system developed using machine learning and the Streamlit framework. It analyzes uploaded files and predicts whether a file is safe or malware using a Random Forest model trained on Windows PE file features for academic demonstration purposes.
An Open Source Machine Learning Framework for Everyone
Synthetic dataset and code for: A Hybrid Machine Learning Framework for AI-Driven Sustainable Development (MDPI Technical Note)

This project aims to build a web-based application that predicts common diseases based on user-provided symptoms. The system uses Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to process user input and K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) for prediction. The application is built with Flask, a Python web framework, and provides a user-friendly interfa

mail Spam Detection using ML is a robust machine learning application designed to automatically classify emails as either "Spam" or "Ham" (safe) based on their content. Built upon the high-performance FastAPI framework, it provides a responsive REST API that can easily integrate with web or mobile frontends.
Real-Time Multi-Agent Framework for Detecting Cascading Failures in Machine Learning Pipelines
Machine Learning framework for proactive risk management. Predicts high-risk departments using operational data and ensemble methods (Random Forest, GBM)
Plant Disease Detection using Machine Learning with its popular framework Pytorch.
Git mirror of the machine learning framework for the ARDS classification in the context of the dissertation by Simon Fonck
An integrative machine learning, explainable AI, and molecular simulation framework for the discovery of selective SIRT1 inhibitors against Triple Negative Breast Cancer
A versatile local LLM framework for chat, image, video, machine learning modelling, speech, and automation
SECS is a machine learning framework designed for structure elucidation from spectra such as NMR and IR.
Behavioral Vulnerability Assessment Framework for IoT-Based Satellite Systems Using Machine Learning

A comprehensive machine learning framework for simulating synthetic indoor signal strength datasets and predicting RSSI values across diverse room geometries using empirical path loss models and deep learning architectures.

A Multi-Layered Security Framework for Digital Payments: Behavioral Biometrics-Based Fraud Detection Using Machine Learning.  The objective of the research is to enhance digital payment security by combining behavioral biometrics with machine learning - based fraud detection.

NRLMF-DTI-MurrayaBAT is a drugtarget interaction framework that applies NRLMF-based negative inference to address data imbalance and employs supervised machine learning to predict interactions between Murraya paniculata bioactive compounds and brown adipose tissueassociated proteins in obesity-related conditions.

An end-to-end Business Analytics project built with Python, integrating data cleaning, outlier detection, customer segmentation using K-Means, and an interactive Streamlit dashboard to transform raw data into actionable business insights.

TensorFlow is an open-source deep learning framework developed by Google. It helps build, train, and deploy machine-learning models using tensors and data-flow graphs. TensorFlow supports neural networks, GPU/TPU acceleration, automatic differentiation, and is widely used in AI applications like image recognition and NLP.
Build and deploy machine learning models with Pontos, an efficient framework that simplifies workflows using Python, PyTorch, and Docker.

MLOptimizer is a comprehensive framework for automatically generating optimized machine learning models while capturing detailed hardware performance metrics. It provides a distributed system for model training, hyperparameter optimization, and hardware resource monitoring.

A growing collection of machine learning concepts implemented from scratch, including neural networks, optimizers, loss functions, and training dynamics. The goal is to build first-principles intuition by reconstructing core algorithms without relying on high-level frameworks.
MULTI-evolve: a machine learning-guided end-to-end framework for engineering hyperactive multi-mutant proteins

BioGraphX is a comprehensive framework for extracting biophysical features from protein sequences using graph-theoretical approaches. The system models proteins as interaction networks where residues form nodes and biochemical interactions form edges, enabling sophisticated feature extraction for downstream machine learning applications
A lightweight, framework-agnostic gRPC library for serving machine learning models in Python
untuk belajar tentang machine learning menggunakan framework fastapi dan dengan menerapkan algoritma regresi linier

Machine learning framework for early detection of major bleeding in acute leukemia using temporal laboratory features and cross-dataset validation. Includes preprocessing, model training, evaluation, and visualization pipelines.

An advanced threat detection framework that integrates signature-based matching with machine learning anomaly detection to identify zero-day vulnerabilities. It features a distributed ML pipeline utilizing secure aggregation for privacy-preserving intelligence sharing and custom-built parsers to normalize logs
Physics-guided machine learning framework for accurate GSM prediction in Single Jersey knit fabric with SHAP-based explainability.

The MLOPS-Databricks repository is a comprehensive framework designed to streamline the machine learning lifecyclefrom data ingestion and model training to deployment and monitoringleveraging the power of the Databricks Lakehouse platform.
Transformers: the model-definition framework for state-of-the-art machine learning models in text, vision, audio, and multimodal models, for both inference and training.
A Multi-Operator Equivariant Framework for High-Fidelity Machine Learning Force Fields
Telco Customer Churn Prediction  This project focuses on predicting customer churn using multiple machine learning models and evaluating them through a comprehensive comparison framework.

Framework for aligning longitudinal Parkinsons Progression Markers Initiative (PPMI) data with the Parkinsons Disease Ontology (PDON) and Movement Disorder Ontology (PMDO). Provides reproducible mapping, ontology instantiation, and ontology-informed machine learning workflows for analysing Parkinsons disease trajectories.
HLSFactory: A Framework Empowering High-Level Synthesis Datasets for Machine Learning and Beyond
Scientific Machine Learning framework simulating AdS/CFT duality using Fourier Neural Operators.
A two-stage hierarchical stacking framework for Mineral Prospectivity Modeling (MPM) using ensemble machine learning methods.
Keep track of the newest machine learning frameworks on GitHub

A geo-AI-based framework to identifying accurate wildfire risk hotspots using 500mx500m MODIS satellite data and integrated with data on vegetation, topography, elevation, and climate data. advanced machine learning classifiers like Random Forest, AI algorithms like self-attention long short-term memory (LSTM), a dynamic risk map is developed.

This research dashboard provides comprehensive analytical and predictive tools for facility management and building engineering. It bridges the gap between raw maintenance logs and actionable intelligence.

A fast, distributed, high performance gradient boosting (GBT, GBDT, GBRT, GBM or MART) framework based on decision tree algorithms, used for ranking, classification and many other machine learning tasks.
A comprehensive ranking and evaluation framework for machine learning models and algorithms

ML-Potion is all about crafting your own machine-learning elixir using the ingredients and frameworks you prefer. Think of the library as a set of building blocksatoms, steps, and componentsthat you can mix, match, and sequence to build a fully customized training or inference pipeline.
This repository is for school assignments within the Machine Learning Framework area.

This project presents a physics-inspired spacecraft telemetry simulation and anomaly detection framework that models power, thermal, and communication subsystems in Low Earth Orbit. It combines engineering-based thresholds and machine learning to analyze synthetic telemetry and study fault detection and spacecraft health monitoring.
Vibro-acoustic simulation and machine learning framework for non-invasive water leak detection in urban plumbing systems. Developed for SJWP India.

This repo contains BACKEND concepts and projects using different BACKEND frameworks like Express and FAST API. We will cover FAST API generally and also especially  machine learning that how we will make APIs for machine learning models.
A two-stage parameter estimation framework integrating Approximate Bayesian Computation and Machine Learning
A clinical-grade machine learning pipeline for breast cancer diagnosis, paired with an interpretable feature framework to support medical decision-making.

"A conceptual framework and technical synthesis of AI Model vs. Tool architectures. Explores the 'Engine and Vehicle' analogy to clarify machine learning stacks, inspired by Courseras Maximize Productivity with AI Tools."
Leakage-aware, reproducible machine learning framework for predicting PTSD, suicidal ideation, and suicide attempts among U.S. veterans using BRFSS Veterans Health Module data.
A data-driven process-structure-property (PSP) modeling framework is developed for freeze-cast porous Al2O3 ceramics by integrating automated machine learning (AutoML) with interpretable analysis.

A simple rule-based AI chatbot built using pure Python (Python 3.14.2 compatible) without any external libraries or machine learning frameworks. The chatbot uses pattern matching and decision rules to simulate intelligent conversation, making it ideal for learning the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence, NLP basics, and Python programming.

Kmeans-NN method for Individual Load Forecasting and online fault detection in smart meters, following the article: Tayseer, M., Talaat, M., Zamel, A.A. et al. "Cyber-resilient machine learning framework for accurate individual load forecasting and anomaly detection in smart grids", Nature, December 2025.

This repository provides a reproducible Python framework for benchmarking eight hyperparameter optimization methods (GS, RS, TPE, GP, HB, CMA-ES, AGA, RCGA) across four tree-based machine learning models (Decision Tree, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and XGBoost) for hourly agricultural reservoir water-level prediction.
A unified framework for machine learning with time series

A real-time, microservices-based machine learning trading framework integrating MetaTrader 4/5 via DWX Connect. It ingests DWX tick data, processes them through Kafka streams to generate candles and technical indicators and generates automated trading signals.
A Julia machine learning framework
A Scientific Machine Learning framework combining mechanistic biological models with Deep Learning to discover hidden pharmacodynamics.

Modular backtesting framework for algorithmic trading using Backtrader. Features a 4-phase state machine strategy, JPY pair P&L correction (ERIS logic), and professional reporting. Educational resource for learning systematic trading.
Code for the integrated feature selection in the manuscript entitled "Leveraging Niche Divergence for Early Detection of Cyanobacterial Blooms: A Metagenomics and Machine Learning Framework".

NeuraOrchestra is an AI training orchestration platform that streamlines the deployment and management of machine learning workflows. It provides a unified interface for training, monitoring, and optimizing AI models across diverse frameworks and datasets.

PhaseLearner is a modular machine-learning framework for extracting phase structure from many-body simulation data. Designed for DQMC and lattice models, it implements dimensionality reduction, latent-space analysis, and physics-informed deep learning models to locate critical parameters, identify symmetry breaking, and characterize emergent order.
A Machine Learning framework written entirely in C language

Enhanced early-stage fairness analysis in machine learning by developing deep learning models and advanced word embeddings to classify sensitive features from user stories, improving accuracy and contextual understanding over existing frameworks like ReFair.

Companion repository for the paper Threat-Driven Frameworks for Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning: A Practitioners Guide (20172025). Contains benchmarking tables, framework metrics, figure sources, and reference summaries for privacy-preserving ML techniques.

In competitive industries like telecoms, retaining customers is as vital as gaining them. Using real-world data, this churn research project analyzes why users leave and how to stop it. By leveraging machine learning and predictive modeling, I translate data into business strategies, creating a framework to maintain an engaged, loyal customer base.
